column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Due says : " How you like that possum chicken ? "
#Text=Sokka says : " Tastes just like arctic hen .
#Text=He 's like a member of the family !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Nice Slim !
#Text=" Due says : " Oh , he do n't eat no bugs !
#Text=That 's people food .
#Text=" Tho says : " Where 'd you say you was from ?
#Text=" Katara says : " The South Pole .
#Text=" Tho says : " Did n't know there was waterbenders anywhere but here .
#Text=They got a nice swamp there , do they ?
#Text=" Katara says : " No , it 's all ice and snow .
#Text=" Tho says : " Hmm .
#Text=No wonder you left .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well , I hope you realize now that nothing strange was going on here .
#Text=Just a bunch of greasy people living in a swamp .
#Text=" Katara says : " What about the visions ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I told you , we were hungry .
#Text=I 'm eating a giant bug !
#Text=" Aang says : " But what about when the tree showed me where Appa and Momo were ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " That 's Avatar stuff , that does n't count .
#Text=The only thing I ca n't figure out is how you made that tornado that sucked us down .
#Text=" Huu says : " I ca n't do anything like that .
#Text=I just bend the water in the plants .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well , no accounting for weather .
#Text=Still , there 's absolutely nothing mysterious about the swamp .
#Text="
